data.title: Gold Coast Private Tour Desk
data.meta_description: Who doesn't love a good theme park? And on the Gold Coast, we are spoilt for choice with an array of world-class theme parks to choose from. So while Sea
data.text:
Who doesn’t love a good theme park? And on the Gold Coast, we are spoilt for choice with an array of world-class theme parks to choose from.

So while Sea World, Dreamworld and Wet’n’Whild are popular options, if you’re looking for a truly unique experience, you can’t go past Warner Bros. Movie World by Village Roadshow Group.

This popular Village Group theme park offers a range of world class rides and attractions, including some based on well-known Warner Bros. films and TV shows such as Batman and Scooby-Doo. See all your favourite characters and favourite stars, including bugs bunny, daffy duck, and the whole looney tunes line up, in person!

There are also several live shows, entertainment offerings, and a range of food outlets catering to all tastes – Hollywood Stunt Driver 2 is a must! And for those looking to get the best deal on Movie World tickets, you’ll be pleased to know there are several family and local passes available that can save you some coin.

With rides, attractions and shows themed around classic movies and cult TV shows, there’s something for everyone at Warner Bros. Movie World on the Gold Coast.

Here’s everything you need to know about the park, Warner Bros. Movie World, from the rides and shows to how to get the best Movie World ticket deals!

Warner Bros. Movie World Theme Park

Warner Bros. Movie World has been a Gold Coast staple since it was opened by the Village Roadshow Group on 3 June 1991. As one of the first theme parks in the Southern Hemisphere, Warner Bros. Movie World helped put the Gold Coast on the map as a must-visit destination.

Today, the Gold Coast is home to dozens of theme parks, including Sea World, Dreamworld and Wet’n’Wild, but Warner Bros. Movie World remains a favourite park among locals and tourists alike.

One of the things that sets Warner Bros. Movie World apart from other theme parks is its Main Street, which is lined with iconic buildings from some of Hollywood’s most beloved movies. Guests can also take pictures with their favourite stars or go on one of the many thrilling rides.

Whether you’re a movie fan or just looking for a fun day out, Warner Bros. Movie World is sure to disappoint!

Warner Bros. Movie World Rides

Warner Bros. Movie World has a great mix of rides for everyone in the family. Thrillseekers will love the Superman Escape ride, which propels guests from 0-100 km/h in just 2.7 seconds, or the Hollywood Stunt Show Spectacular, which takes guests on a wild ride through movie sets. There’s also the Batwing Spaceshot, which sends guests soaring into the sky at speeds of up to 130 km/h! If you’re after something a bit more mild, try out the Scooby-Doo Spooky Coaster or the Road Runner Rollercoaster. And for those little ones, there’s loads of fun rides like Daffy Duck’s Duck Dodgers Adventure and Yosemite Sam’s Cartoon Junction.

Thrill Rides

The Village Group of Companies know a thing or two about thrill rides, and this is on full display at Warner Bros. Movie World. As one of the most popular theme parks, it is home to all the fun and thrill rides your heart could desire!

There’s the DC Rivals Hypercoaster, the Southern Hemisphere’s tallest and one of the world’s fastest hypercoasters. For the Scooby Doo fans, take a ride on the Spooky Coaster and help solve the mystery! Unsure if you’re up for all the thrills? No problem! Wild West Falls Adventure Ride is a family-friendly ride that everyone can enjoy. And don’t forget Green Lantern Coaster and the DC Super Villains Unleashed and DOOMSDAY Destroyer – two heart-pounding rides sure to get your adrenaline pumping! Whatever your thrill level, Warner Bros. Movie World has a trill ride for you!

We took the arduous task of testing each thrill ride at the theme park and have listed our top 5 below:

DC Rivals Hypercoaster: The DC Rivals HyperCoaster is for those who want the ultimate adrenaline rush! With speeds of up to 100km/h, it’s the fastest HyperCoaster in Australia!

Scooby Doo Spooky Coaster: Join lifelong friends Scooby and Shaggy on their wildest ride yet! Travel through dark and spooky forests, haunted houses and more as you help them solve the mystery of the Ghostly Gang. Hold on tight – it’s going to be a bumpy ride!

Wild West Falls Adventure Ride: Take this thrilling adventure ride back in time to the Wild West. Plunge into darkness on a journey down a raging waterfall, then navigate your way through ghost towns, wagon trains, and geysers. It’s an exciting journey you’ll never forget!

Green Lantern Coaster: Enter the world of Green Lantern with this out-of-this-world coaster. Soar through the sky on a quest to protect our planet from evil forces. With breathtaking twists and turns, this is one coaster you don’t want to miss!

DOOMSDAY Destroyer: The DC Comics Super-Villains Unleashed and the DOOMSDAY Destroyer is not for the faint of heart; it’s sure to send chills down your spine!

Kids Rides

Kids will have a blast at Warner Bros. Movie World, with plenty of fun options to choose from.

The Road Runner Rollercoaster is perfect for little thrill-seekers, while the Kids WB Fun Zone offers a range of rides and attractions for younger children. Looney Tunes Village is a must-visit for fans of the classic Looney Tunes characters, with the Splash Zone and Carousel providing hours of fun. Justice League 3D – The Ride is another popular attraction, offering an immersive 3D experience for riders. And for those looking to learn some new skills, the Junior Driving School is the perfect place to start.

With kids in toe, we tested each kids ride at the theme park and have listed our top 5 below:

Road Runner Rollercoaster: This ride is a must-do for any thrill seeker visiting Warner Bros. Movie World. Featuring a whopping three inversions, this coaster will have you spinning and flipping through the air in no time

Kids WB Fun Zone: If you’re looking for a less intense experience, the Kids WB Fun Zone is perfect for younger visitors. With a range of activities to keep them entertained, including a giant slide and ball pit, kids will have a blast bouncing around this themed area

Looney Tunes Splash Zone: For a wet and wild adventure, make sure to check out the Looney Tunes Splash Zone. Filled with fun water features and slides, this zone is perfect for cooling down on a hot day. Plus, who can resist taking a selfie with their favourite character?

Justice League 3D – The Ride: The Ride is the ultimate in family entertainment. Blending thrilling coaster action with 3D movie effects, this ride is sure to please all ages. So step into the shoes of your favourite DC Super Hero and experience an adventure like no other.

Speedy Gonzales’ Tijuana Taxis: Take a spin in one of Speedy Gonzales’ Tijuana Taxis and hang on tight! With its rapid movements and twists, this ride is sure to get your heart racing.

Whether you’re looking for theme parks offering thrill rides or family-friendly fun, Warner Bros. Movie World Gold Coast has something for everyone. With our top 5 lists, you’ll be sure to make the most of your visit to this fantastic theme park.

Warner Bros. Movie World Live Shows

Theme parks aren’t just about rides! They’re also about entertainment. And, there’s no shortage of incredible entertainment at Warner Bros. Movie World Gold Coast! If you’re looking for something fun and entertaining to do while you’re at Movie World, be sure to check out one of the many live shows that are on offer!

From thrilling stunt shows to musical performances, there’s something to suit everyone’s taste. And with shows taking place throughout the day, you’re sure to find one that fits into your schedule.

Hollywood Stunt Driver 2

Hollywood stunt drivers are the unsung heroes of the silver screen. While actors and actresses get all the glory, stunt drivers are the ones who make death-defying action scenes possible. In Movie World’s Hollywood Stunt Driver 2 show, audiences can see firsthand how these daring professionals work their magic. From high-speed car chases to thrilling motorcycle stunts, the show offers a behind-the-scenes look at how some of Hollywood’s most iconic action scenes are created. Precision driving and split-second timing are essential for pulling off these stunts, and the stunt drivers in the show demonstrate their incredible skills with exhilarating results. So if you’re looking for heart-stopping thrills and edge-of-your-seat excitement, the Hollywood Stunt Show Spectacular is not to be missed.

Wonder Woman Show

Warner Bros. Movie World Gold Coast’s Wonder Woman Show is one of the most exciting and entertaining shows on Main Street. Wonder Woman easily fights off a group of thieving mercenaries, stopping their plan dead in its tracks. The action is intense and very well choreographed, making it a must-see for any fan of action movies. The setting of Main Street also adds to the excitement, as it feels like you are right in the middle of the action.

Overall, the Warner Bros. Movie World Gold Coast’s Wonder Woman Show is an excellent example of what a great live action show should be.

Warner Bros. Movie World Entertainment

Warner Bros. Movie World Gold Coast is where you can see all your favourite Warner Bros. characters come to life before your eyes. From Dorothy (Wizard Of Oz) live on Main Street to the WB Studio Showcase, there’s something for everyone at this park. One of the highlights is the Star Parade, where you can see all your favourite characters marching down the street in a dazzling display of colour and light. And of course, no visit to Warner Bros. Movie World Gold Coast would be complete without experiencing the Looney Tunes Dance, where you can boogie down with Bugs Bunny and friends. Finally, don’t miss out on the Scoob! 4D Experience, where you can help Scooby and the gang solve a mystery in an immersive 4D setting.

It’s entertainment such as this that makes Movie World one of the most love theme parks in the Southern Hemisphere.

WB Studio Showcase – Featuring Batman Legacy

This must-see exhibition, Batman Legacy, is the largest official Warner Bros. Batman exhibition in the Southern Hemisphere featuring an incredible collection of props, costumes and memorabilia from the iconic Batman films. Don’t miss your chance to see some of the most famous movie sets and props ever created while visiting the park! This Batman exhibition brings Batman films to life!

Star Parade

Watch as your favourite movie stars parade down Main Street in this spectacular show. Featuring all the biggest stars from Warner Bros. movies, this is a spectacle you won’t want to miss!

Looney Tunes Dance

Come and see your favourite Looney Tunes characters on the Gold Coast as they drive down Main Street, grooving to funky tunes. With appearances by Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and more, this is a show you won’t want to miss!

Scoob! 4D Experience

Join your favourite crime-busting crew and lifelong friends Scooby, Shaggy as they face their most challenging mystery yet! The all new SCOOB! 4D Experience at Roxy Theatre at Warner Bros. Movie World is not to be missed. Watch the whole crime busting crew come face to face with a wild beast from a prehistoric underworld in their battle to stop a fiendish plot. With cutting-edge 4D technology, this is the wildest adventure yet!

Meet And Greets

Ready to meet your heroes and villains? Guests can become lost in a world of fantasy and fun, with plenty of opportunities to meet some of their favourite stars. The Looney Tunes, Tom and Jerry, DC Super Heroes and DC Super-Villains are just some of the characters that guests can meet during their day at the park. Scooby-Doo, Shaggy, Marilyn Monroe, and other beloved characters are available for meet-and-greets throughout the day. Whether you’re a fan of cartoons or comic books, there’s sure to be a character you’ll love meeting at Warner Bros. Movie World!

JL 52 Batmobile

If you’re a fan of Batman, then you won’t want to miss the opportunity to see the JL 52 Batmobile at Warner Bros. Movie World on the Gold Coast. This sleek ride is exclusive to the park, and you can catch a glimpse of it during the Streets Star Parade as Batman and Robin patrol Main Street. Plus, you can also snap a photo with the Batmobile in The Bat Alley throughout the day.

So make sure to keep an eye out for this iconic vehicle during your visit to Warner Bros. Movie World. And if you want a truly memorable experience, you can even get your photo professionally taken with Batman, Robin and the Batmobile – purchase your photo in-park.

New Attractions at Warner Bros. Movie World

New Wizard of Oz Precinct

Get ready to journey over the rainbow with a new Wizard of Oz precinct coming to Warner Bros. Movie World in 2024.

The world-first precinct will feature two new family-friendly rides – the Suspended Family Coaster ride and the Family Boomerang Racer ride – as well as a multi-million-dollar immersive experience based on the beloved movie. The Suspended Family Coaster is a 454-metre-long track that reaches a height of 19 metres, with a top speed of 67km/h. The Family Boomerang Racer is a two-track ride with 225 and 220-metre-long courses, both reaching a height of 22 metres and travelling at 58km/h. This is sure to be a must-do experience for visitors of all ages!

Warner Bros. Movie World Food Outlets

Eating at Warner Bros. Movie World is almost as much fun as riding the rides! There are plenty of delicious options to choose from, from burgers and tacos to coffee and desserts. The Village Bean Coffee House is great for getting your caffeine fix, while the Dirty Harry Bar & Grill is perfect for kicking back with a cold drink. If you’re feeling hungry, why not try one of the mouth-watering dishes at the Gotham City Cafe? And for those with a sweet tooth, Sweet Treats will be your idea of heaven! There’s something for everyone at Warner Bros. Movie World, so be sure to explore all of the food options on offer!

Our tip is Dirty Harry Bar & Grill; you will not regret it!

Warner Bros. Movie World Opening Hours

Village Roadshow Warner Bros. Movie World is open from 9:30 AM to 5:00 PM every day except for Christmas Day, when the park is closed. During the school holidays, from 27 December to 15 January, the park is open from 9:00 AM to 7:00 PM.

Standad Opening Hours – 9:30 AM – 5:00 PM

25 December – Closed

27 December – 15 January 9:00 AM – 7:00 PM

Warner Bros. Movie World Tickets

Looking for Warner Bros. Movie World Tickets? You have a few options! You can purchase them as you arrive at the box office, or you can book Movie World tickets online via a convenient ticketing system for fast and seamless entry. Another way to get fast and seamless entry, along with the best deals available, is by booking tickets through Gold Coast Private Tour Desk.

Buy Movie World Tickets

Also, receive exclusive offers and the latest entertainment news, and be the first to hear about new releases and upcoming events by following our blog.

Conclusion

Warner Bros. Movie World is a must-visit destination for anyone looking for a fun and thrilling day out. With plenty of rides, shows and food outlets to choose from, there’s something for everyone at the park.
